tool_description: API showing weather in all wilayas of Algeria Live and for  free
name: Dz Meteo Live
title: Dz Meteo Live

api_list.name: Index Wilaya
api_list.description:
Get Weather in specific wilaya with index wilaya
for ex /wilaya/16 
this end point is for Wilaya Alger
for ex /wilaya/38
this endpoint is for Wilaya Tissemsilt
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dz-meteo-live.p.rapidapi.com/wilaya/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dz-meteo-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dz-meteo-live.p.rapidapi.com/wilaya/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dz-meteo-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All wilayas
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return back all wilayas weather,
with: 
index_wilaya
name
temp
statue
img
api_list.code:
